''''PASS'''' : ''''FAIL''''); console.log(''''  Transactions count:'''', d.data?.transactions?.length || 0); console.log(''''  Has pagination:'''', d.data?.pagination ? ''''YES'''' : ''''NO'''');")

Bash(node -e "const d=JSON.parse(require(''''fs'''').readFileSync(0,''''utf-8'''')); if (d.success) { console.log(''''✅ AC1: Transaction list fetched''''); console.log(''''  Transactions:'''', d.data.transactions.length); console.log(''''  Pagination:'''', JSON.stringify(d.data.pagination)); if (d.data.transactions.length > 0) { const t = d.data.transactions[0]; console.log(''''✅ AC2: Transaction has required fields:''''); console.log(''''  - date:'''', t.date); console.log(''''  - type:'''', t.type); console.log(''''  - category:'''', t.category); console.log(''''  - amount:'''', t.amount); console.log(''''  - description:'''', t.description || ''''null''''); } } else { console.log(''''❌ API Error:'''', d.error); }")

Bash(node -e "const d=JSON.parse(require(''''fs'''').readFileSync(0,''''utf-8'''')); if (d.success) { console.log(''''✅ AC1: Transaction list fetched successfully''''); console.log(''''  Total transactions:'''', d.data.transactions.length); console.log(''''  Page:'''', d.data.pagination.page, ''''/'''', d.data.pagination.totalPages); console.log(''''  Total count:'''', d.data.pagination.totalCount); if (d.data.transactions.length > 0) { const t = d.data.transactions[0]; console.log(''''✅ AC2: Sample transaction fields present:''''); console.log(''''  - date:'''', t.date); console.log(''''  - type:'''', t.type); console.log(''''  - category:'''', t.category); console.log(''''  - amount:'''', t.amount); console.log(''''  - description:'''', t.description || ''''null''''); } } else { console.log(''''❌ Error:'''', d.error?.message); }")
